Assessment.QuestionText: Can you arrange the steps for inheriting the Windows Forms existing controls in correct order?

Options.Option: From the Project menu, select Add User Control.
Include the required properties and methods.
Modify the name of the base class.

Steps.Step: From the Project menu, select Add User Control.
Include the required properties and methods.
Modify the name of the base class.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct sequence is displayed on the right.
